name: Kari Raya Pizza
description: Limited time pizza with 12 pockets full of curry and potato, topped with chicken pop, mozzarella cheese and more curry goodness

name: Sweet And Sour
description: 18 cheesy bites in ong-some flavour of sweet, sour and the NEW Peach Mayo sauce, topped with chicken chunks, salami and golden pineapple

name: Creamy Crispy Chicken
description: New creamy white sauce topped with crispy chicken pops fried to perfection, only available on the new light & airy Hand Crafted Pizza

name: Creamy Chicken Fiesta
description: New creamy white sauce with chicken salami and chicken pepperoni, only available on the new light & airy Hand Crafted Pizza

name: Creamy Chicken Fiesta
description: New creamy white sauce with beef pepperoni & cabanossi meat, only available on the new light & airy Hand Crafted Pizza

name: Blazing Seafood
description: with spicy sweet sour sauce, tuna, crabsticks, pineapples, capsicums, onions, mozzarella cheese.

name: Chicken Supreme
description: with tomato sauce, chicken meat, chicken salami, chicken loaf, mushrooms, capsicums, onions, mozzarella cheese, tomatoes.

name: Hawaiian Supreme
description: with tomato sauce, chicken meat, chicken loaf, pineapples, mozzarella cheese.

name: Island Supreme
description: with thousand island sauce, crabsticks, tuna, pineapples, onions, mozzarella cheese.

name: Super Supreme
description: with tomato sauce, ground beef, beef pepperoni, beef cabanossi, chicken loaf, mushrooms, pineapples, capsicums, olives, mozzarella cheese.

name: Triple Chicken
description: with thousand island sauce, chicken rolls, chicken meat, chicken salami, mushrooms, tomatoes, onions, mozzarella cheese.

name: Aloha Chicken
description: with thousand island sauce, chicken rolls, chicken salami, pineapples, mozzarella cheese.

name: Beef Pepperoni
description: with tomato sauce, beef pepperoni, mozzarella cheese.

name: Chicken Delight
description: with BBQ sauce, chicken meat, mushrooms, onions, mozzarella cheese.

name: Chicken Sensation
description: with spicy sweet sour sauce, chicken meat, pineapples, onions, mozzarella cheese.

name: Chicken Pepperoni
description: with tomato sauce, chicken pepperoni, mozzarella cheese.

name: Deluxe Cheese
description: with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese.

name: Hawaiian Chicken
description: with tomato sauce, chicken meat, pineapples, mozzarella cheese.

name: Island Tuna
description: with thousand island sauce, tuna, pineapples, onions, mozzarella cheese.

name: Veggie Lover
description: with tomato sauce, mushrooms, pineapples, tomatoes, capsicums, onions, mozzarella cheese. (Contains garlic, onions and cheese which may not be suitable for vegetarians).

name: Asam Pedas Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti with Asam Pedas sauce, chicken pepperoni, capsicums, mushroom, herbs and a dash of chili flakes.

name: Chicken Meatballs Bolognaise Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti with Tomato Bolognaise sauce, topped with Chicken Meatballs.

name: Salami Olio Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti tossed in olive oil, chicken salami and capsicums. Slightly spicy with a dash of chilli flakes.

name: Creamy Carbonara Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti with Creamy Carbonara sauce, chicken rolls, mushrooms and herbs.

name: Aglio Olio Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti tossed in olive oil, herbs, mushrooms and capsicums. Slightly spicy with a dash of chilli flakes.

name: Creamy Chicken Pepperoni Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti with Creamy Carbonara sauce and Chicken Pepperoni.

name: Classic Tomato Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti with Tomato Bolognaise sauce and shredded chicken.

name: Limo Pizza
description: Pizza limo is 1m long, there are 3 typical types of pizza hut and fragrant fried potatoes. Suitable for groups of 8-10 people.

name: Combo 1
description: For 2 people. 01 traditional pizza (medium size). 01 minced beef with tomato sauce/ lettuce mixed with tuna and bacon/ chips. 01 cans of Pepsi/ 7up/ Mirinda

name: Combo 2
description: For 3-4 people. 01 Pizza ALC (medium sized). 01 minced beef noodles with tomato sauce/01 spaghetti seafood tomato sauce. 01 lettuce mixed with tuna and bacon/ 01 rolled cheese/ 01 chips/ 01 garlic butter bread. 02 cans of Pepsi/ 7up/ Mirinda soft drinks

name: Combo 3
description: For 5-6 people. 01 Pizza ALC (large size). 01 BBQ grilled chicken wings (4 pieces)/ Korean spicy fried chicken wings (4 pieces). 01 minced beef noodles with tomato sauce/ 01 spaghetti seafood tomato sauce. 01 lettuce mixed with tuna and bacon/ 01 rolled cheese/ 01 chips/ 01 garlic butter bread. 01 bottle of Pepsi/ 7up/ Mirinda 1.5L
